spatial_accuracy.notes: Major spatial mismatches between plan and render. The bottom-right room labeled "Monica's Bedroom" in the 2D plan is rendered as an office/dining-like room with a large table and no clear bed (E1/E2). A bed appears in the bottom-center area instead, shifting bedroom location relative to the plan (E2). Bottom façade window/door layout is inconsistent: the 3D shows extended/continuous glazing along the bottom-left and a large opening at the bottom-right that are not indicated in the plan (E2/E5). Several interior door locations/hinges do not align with the plan’s swing/placement, especially around the central hall/den zone (E2/E3). Room proportions are noticeably altered (living/central hall widened; bedroom footprints not preserved) (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are partially preserved (living/kitchen zone generally top, wet areas left/center), but key program fidelity fails: Monica’s bedroom is effectively missing as a bedroom program (E1) and replaced by a different room use (E5). Wall thickness is mostly consistent, but several partitions/returns differ from the plan in the entry/den corridor and bedroom separations (E2/E4). Door embedding and orientation appear inconsistent with the plan in multiple locations (E2/E3). Multiple exterior openings appear hallucinated or relocated relative to the plan (E5/E2).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not reliably match the 2D plan. The right-side bedroom’s bed/nightstands layout is not represented; instead, a large table/desk arrangement appears (E1/E5). Bed placement appears shifted to a different room footprint than shown in plan (E2). Several furniture scales (table vs room size, seating group spacing) are inconsistent with the plan’s implied clearances (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean and readable with generally correct isometric viewpoint. Lighting is soft and consistent; geometry is mostly clean. Minor issues: some openings/frames look simplified and a few wall/door intersections feel imprecise (E6). Projection is not perfectly orthographic (slight perspective feel), but overall composition is clear.

detected_errors.description: Monica's Bedroom (bottom-right in plan) is not rendered as a bedroom; the bed/nightstands shown in plan are missing.
Bedroom program appears relocated: a bed is placed in a different bottom-area room footprint than the plan indicates for Monica's Bedroom.
Hallucinated room use: bottom-right room contains a large table/office/dining-like setup not supported by the 2D plan labeling/furniture layout.
Exterior opening layout mismatch: bottom façade shows extended glazing/large openings in 3D that do not correspond to the plan’s window placements.
Possible hallucinated large exterior opening/door at the bottom-right wall not indicated on the 2D plan.
Multiple interior doors around the central hall/den area are positioned differently than in the plan.
Several door swing/orientation directions differ from the plan (hinge side and opening direction inconsistencies).
Room proportion distortions: bedroom footprints and central circulation/den proportions do not match the 2D plan.
Minor rendering/geometry artifacts: simplified door/window frames and slightly imprecise wall-door junctions.
